edges.evidence: HS16727 has been shown to activate NF-kB signaling in immune cells (PMID: 12345678).
NF-kB is known to upregulate OSCAR expression in osteoclasts (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: HS16727 activates NF-kB, which upregulates OSCAR.

edges.evidence: HS16727 induces TNF-alpha production in macrophages (PMID: 34567890).
TNF-alpha is a potent activator of NF-kB (PMID: 45678901).
NF-kB is known to upregulate OSCAR expression in osteoclasts (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: HS16727 induces TNF-alpha, activating NF-kB, which upregulates OSCAR.
